cause.description:
This cause was generated to promote sideburn growth for every man across the planet.
It should be a requirement that every man is to have sideburns at least down to the bottom of their ears.
It's been scientifically proven that without sideburns the world would explode.
This cause is to help make the world a better, sexier place.
1. Sideburns solve all problems.
2. Sideburn growth will automatically make you hot.
3. Sideburns > Everything
cause.mission: is to enforce the requirement that all men are to grow sideburns.
cause.name: Grow the Sideburns
